title: Uncle Si Gives a Shout-Out to Truckers & Wallops the Media
description:
Si declares it Appreciation Day for all the truckers, first responders, medical professionals, farmers, and other hardworking people who keep this country humming. He calls out the media for refusing to tell the whole story and reveals which book made him cry 10 times. Martin and John-David debate whether or not all dogs go to heaven. Si is fixing to teach robocallers a lesson. Godwin keeps the jokes coming. John-David helps a fan out with her pregnancy announcement. And the boys have advice about a love triangle.
-
